1594820.name: ASMR LIGHTness - Light painting Soundtrack
1594820.description:
Relaxing music for sleep, meditation and stress reduction

ASMR LIGHTness - The soundtrack is atmospheric relaxing music for deep sleep and reduce stress. Fall asleep to the beautiful sounds of nature while listening to a recording with relaxing music for sleep, meditation, study or just relax! All music uses ASMR, 3D sounds, binaural recording. After downloading this soundtrack, you can listen to it through the Steam Music Player or add it to any of your favorite players.


This is the first ASMR healing soundtrack on Steam. If any new songs are added to the game in the future, those songs will also be added to this soundtrack. Currently, it is over 130 minutes of relaxing music and over 1.81 GB (High quality)!

Features

- Over 130 minutes of amazing music

- ASMR
- 3D audio
- Binaural recording
- Reduces stress
- Relaxation music for sleeping
- Low (250 MB) and high quality (1.81 GB)
- Relaxing nature sounds
- Music for relaxation and study
- Music for babies sleeping
- Music for deep sleep and meditation

Soundtrack is from the ASMR LIGHTness - Light painting
